snippet.title: Art Heist, White Hat Game Trailer
snippet.description:
In Art Heist, you're part of a white-hat contract team that can steal just about anything. Guide your operative on the scene to avoid a variety of guards, dogs, and other electrical hazards. Use the blueprints of real museums to show how you'd sneak your operative in and out. But remember, the clock is ticking and time is money.

Your role is to protect the art, by showing the vulnerabilities in the security system.

Available on Google Play and iTunes  now:

Apple iPhone and iPad:
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1378716011

Android  Free with ads: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mindtoggle.artfree

No ads for $1 USD:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mindtoggle.artheist
